Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and identify nucleic acid targets in respiratory specimens from microbial agents that cause the SARS-CoV-2 respiratory infection and other microbial agents when in a multi-target test
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Visby Medical Respiratory Health Test (self-contained device)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Visby Medical Respiratory Health Test, a single-use, self-contained RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A, and influenza B from nasal swab specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Single-use automated RT-PCR test for simultaneous qualitative detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A, and influenza B RNA in nasopharyngeal and anterior nasal swab specimens from symptomatic individuals, aiding differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical assessment.
